name: Raja_Spa_17-inch_Throw_Pillows_(Set_of_2)
reviews: Colors are brighter than I would have expected. Pillows are overstuffed, but smaller than advetised. Do not look like 17". Closer to 12-14". Only reason I did not give 5 stars. Material is super soft, with a very "high end" Feel and look!
I love the colors, but it's a little small. I wish the size was bigger.
Great quality. Colors are brighter and more vibrant than shown online. Very please with this purchase.
Pillows goes very nice with Aberly Accent Chair.Excellent product and made in USA.
They look like the photo except the back is a solid fabric. I was disappointed and returned them
Look 1000 times better in person, worth the money, receive a lot of compliments on them. Great quality.
Great throw pilliws. Color was perfect for accenting my son's sofa.
Very soft. The light blue and green accents are very pretty.

If you're purchasing these to match the Aberly Accent Chair, don't. The difference in color is almost comical. However, if you're buying them as stand alone pillows, then you'll be fine. They're very soft and I noticed made in the USA. The colors are just pretty bright.
These pillows were better than I expected.Just love them!
Soft and cute pillows. Great buy.
Tied yellow ribbon around the pillows to match the bedroom color scheme.

These were very nice pillows...however, they do not match the Aberly Accent Chairs that I bought them to go with AT ALL and they were listed as people buying them together. This was very misleading and now I have to pay to return them.
Great material, well made, well stuffed - matches perfectly to the design of the livingroom rug - very happy!
The material of the pillows are of a velvet in nature, not what I expected.
Perfect touch to the matching chairs! Love them! Quality is superb!
Love the quality of the pillows stuffed really well and match my chair pattern perfectly
description: Relax on the soft polyester material in these throw pillows. Their size of 17 inches makes them just right for providing additional back support on a sofa or chair. With a durable cotton covering, they stay soft and comfortable for many years.Set includes two pillowsDotted patternCover does not detachKnife edging on a square pillow shapeMeasures 17 inches high igh and 17 inches wide ideMade with 100 percent polyester fill and 100 percent cotton covering for durabilityClean simply with a damp clothStyleContemporary, TraditionalMaterialCotton, PolyesterPatternDotSet IncludeTwo PillowsCare InstructionSpot CleanSeason or HolidayAll SeasonsPillow ShapeSquareColorBlue, Brown, TanFill TypePolyesterPillow TypeAccent
